statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE date_admitted >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_admitted ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE health_condition LIKE '%diabetes%' AND address IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patient_data WHERE health_condition='Diabetes' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE date_admitted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_conditions WHERE condition_name='Diabetes';
SELECT patient_name, condition_name, diagnosis_date FROM patients p, health_conditions hc WHERE p.patient_id=hc.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients INNER JOIN health_conditions ON patients.patient_id = health_conditions.patient_id WHERE condition_name = 'Diabetes'
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, condition_name FROM patients JOIN health_conditions ON patients.patient_id = health_conditions.patient_id ORDER BY age DESC, gender
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender, city FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, city FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, city FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, HealthConditions.condition_name FROM Patients JOIN HealthConditions ON Patients.patient_id = HealthConditions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Conditions WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, location FROM Doctors WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 50

SELECT Conditions.condition_name, Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, Conditions.diagnosis_date FROM Conditions INNER JOIN Patients ON Conditions.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Conditions.diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT Demographics.ethnicity, Demographics.language, Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name FROM Demographics INNER JOIN Patients ON Demographics.patient_id = Patients.patient_id ORDER BY Demographics.ethnicity, Demographics.language
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT condition_name, diagnosis_date, treatment FROM HealthConditions ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT address_line, city, state, zipcode FROM PatientAddresses WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_date, demographic_category, total_count, average_age FROM DemographicsAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT condition_name, total_cases, recovery_rate FROM HealthConditionsAnalysis WHERE recovery_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT condition_name, diagnosis_date, treatment FROM HealthConditions WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT address_line, city, state, zipcode FROM PatientAddresses WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_date, demographic_category, total_count FROM DemographicsAnalysis ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, condition_name, total_cases, recovery_rate FROM HealthConditionsAnalysis WHERE total_cases > 10 ORDER BY recovery_rate DESC;
